${modID}:HeroicStrike.NAME: Heroic Strike
${modID}:HeroicStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL All Heroic Strike cards deal !M! more damage this combat.

${modID}:Bloodiness.NAME: Bloodiness
${modID}:Bloodiness.DESCRIPTION: Lose !${modID}:HPLost! HP. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times.

${modID}:EternalAegis.NAME: Eternal Aegis
${modID}:EternalAegis.DESCRIPTION: Lose !${modID}:HPLost! HP. NL Prevent the next !M! times you would lose HP.

${modID}:PropheticWritings.NAME: Prophetic Writings
${modID}:PropheticWritings.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 HP. NL Draw cards until you have !M! in hand.

${modID}:CollateralDamage.NAME: Collateral Damage
${modID}:CollateralDamage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP during your turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.
${modID}:CollateralDamage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you lose HP during your turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:Injury.NAME: Injury
${modID}:Injury.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1HP, do this action 3 times. NL Heal !M! HP

${modID}:Regeneration.NAME: Regeneration
${modID}:Regeneration.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP during your turn, heal 1 HP.

${modID}:FacingDestiny.NAME: Facing Destiny
${modID}:FacingDestiny.DESCRIPTION: Your HP is 1. NL You can't take damage during 2 turns. NL At the end of the combat, Heal !M! HP.

${modID}:BloodyArmor.NAME: Bloody Armor
${modID}:BloodyArmor.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 HP. Gain 5 armor. Do these actions !M! times.

${modID}:ColdBlood.NAME: Cold Blood
${modID}:ColdBlood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you have received damage this turn, Heal !M!.

${modID}:MagicWave.NAME: Magic Wave
${modID}:MagicWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL ennemies. Damage equal to the HP lost this combat.

${modID}:NoOneWillPass.NAME: No One Will Pass
${modID}:NoOneWillPass.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP during your turn, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Surpassing.NAME: Surpassing
${modID}:Surpassing.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP during your turn, gain 1 temporary Strength.
${modID}:Surpassing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP during your turn, gain 1 temporary Strength and 1 temporary Dexterity.

${modID}:BloodyStrike.NAME: Bloody Strike
${modID}:BloodyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1HP. Deal !D! damage. Draw 1 card. NL If you have received damage this turn, Gain [E]

${modID}:Feast.NAME: Feast
${modID}:Feast.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, heal !M! HP.

${modID}:AllInOne.NAME: All in One
${modID}:AllInOne.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Heal 4 HP. NL Gain 10 Gold. Exhaust.

${modID}:Void.NAME: Void
${modID}:Void.DESCRIPTION: Deal X damage to an enemy. X equal your missing HP รท !M!.

${modID}:ThirstForPower.NAME: Thirst for Power
${modID}:ThirstForPower.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Power to your hand. Lose HP equal to its cost, then set its cost to 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Choice.NAME: Choice
${modID}:Choice.DESCRIPTION: Choose : Deal !D! damage to a random enemy or Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:StrikeNow.NAME: Strike Now
${modID}:StrikeNow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:Cloning.NAME: Cloning
${modID}:Cloning.DESCRIPTION: Create !M! copies of the last card you played and put them in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Unsheathe.NAME: Unsheathe
${modID}:Unsheathe.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. Gain as much temporary Strength as its cost.
${modID}:Unsheathe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. Gain as much temporary Strength as its cost +1

${modID}:Bet.NAME: Bet
${modID}:Bet.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. If it's upgraded, gain !M! Strength. Else, upgrade it for the rest of combat.

${modID}:Assault.NAME: Assault
${modID}:Assault.DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile.
${modID}:Assault.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the top card of your draw pile for the rest of combat and play it.

${modID}:EmergencyAssault.NAME: Emergency Assault
${modID}:EmergencyAssault.DESCRIPTION: Play the 3 top cards of your draw pile.
${modID}:EmergencyAssault.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the 3 top cards of your draw pile for the rest of combat and play them.

${modID}:LeaveItToFate.NAME: Leave it to Fate
${modID}:LeaveItToFate.DESCRIPTION: Randomly increase or decrease the cost of each card in your hand by 1. NL !M! chances out of 10 to reduce the cost

${modID}:Avarice.NAME: Avarice
${modID}:Avarice.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1HP, Heal !M! HP, Gain 1 [E], X times. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HeroicDefend.NAME: Heroic Defend
${modID}:HeroicDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL All Heroic Defend cards grant !M! more Block this combat.

${modID}:Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
${modID}:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have taken 3 or more damage during your turn. NL Gain [E]
${modID}:Frenzy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have taken 3 or more damage during your turn. NL Gain [E] [E]

${modID}:Backlash.NAME: Backlash
${modID}:Backlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain 1 Weak and 1 Vulnerable.

${modID}:Pilgrimage.NAME: Pilgrimage
${modID}:Pilgrimage.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Debuffs at the end of your next turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:WarTactics.NAME: War Tactics
${modID}:WarTactics.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

${modID}:DoubleImpact.NAME: Double Impact
${modID}:DoubleImpact.DESCRIPTION: All Attacks you play this turn are played twice.

${modID}:Riptide.NAME: Riptide
${modID}:Riptide.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL ennemies !M! times.

${modID}:StrategicStrikes.NAME: Strategic Strikes
${modID}:StrategicStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Each time you play a card containing "Strike", Draw !M! card.
${modID}:StrategicStrikes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Each time you play a card containing "Strike", Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Replenishment.NAME: Replenishment
${modID}:Replenishment.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL One card containing "Defend" in your hand costs 0 until it is played.
${modID}:Replenishment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL ALL card containing "Defend" in your hand costs 0 until they are played.
